column2: Wanda Sports Group Co. Ltd. operates global sports events, media and marketing platform. The company is headquartered in Beijing, Beijing and currently employs 1,624 full-time employees. The firm provides events operation, media production and media distribution, sponsorship and marketing, digital solutions and ancillary services.
9/F, Tower B,Wanda Plaza, 93 Jianguo Road, Chaoyang District
